import React from 'react' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import ThemeContext from '../../../Context/ThemeContext' import { JobInfo, JobDetails } from '../../../Elements' import { JobDB } from '../../../DB/JobDB' const Job = () => { const router = useRouter(); const { id: passedID } = router.query; let passedJob = JobDB.filter(job => job.id == Number(passedID))[0] console.log(passedID); return ( {!passedJob ? Job not found :

{passedJob.title}

Job Description
{passedJob.description}
} ) } export default Job
